channel.title: Hugo on Yannick Nepomuk Fritz
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Yannick Nepomuk Fritz

item.title: Yannick Nepomuk Fritz
item.description: I am a PhD Candidate at the University of Basel in the NOMIS project  «Assisted Thinking: A Deep History of Scholarly AI» where I work on a PhD project on Prompting with AI Models. I completed my M.A. in media philosophy and art research at Karlsruhe University of Arts and Design (HfG Karlsruhe) with a thesis on the political epistemology of generativity pertaining to artificial intelligence. Previously, I studied media and cultural studies in Vienna, Potsdam and Hong Kong.
